thread.title: Vision-e Names Norm Sherman as Chief Technology Officer
thread.title_full: Vision-e Names Norm Sherman as Chief Technology Officer

author: Lauren Santander
title: Vision-e Names Norm Sherman as Chief Technology Officer
text:
Vision-e, a salesforce.com partner providing sales productivity software, applications and services, announced today that Norm Sherman will now oversee the development of the company’s applications, talent acquisition, and overall cloud-based strategy. Vision-e’s suite of applications, available on the Salesforce AppExchange, are uniquely designed to help companies of all sizes achieve the ROI they want from their CRM investment. As the Senior Software Engineer for the Vision-e team for nearly four years, Sherman held a key role in the strategy and development of Vision-e’s application suite, says Vision-e Chief Executive Officer, Jule Limoli.
“Norm has an uncanny ability to think outside of the box, engineering invaluable business tools that incorporate excellent end-user experience, agility of use, and return on investment for the companies that adopt them,” Limoli says. “We are confident Norm’s tremendous leadership skills, insight and strategic vision will take our team steadily into the future as a leader of cloud-based, sales productivity solutions.”
Sherman brings 15 years of software development and IT infrastructure experience to his new role at Vision-e. In his previous role with the company as Senior Software Engineer, he created a company presence on the SalesForce AppExchange with a suite of Sales productivity apps, such as eMapping, eContacts and eCoach, and architected solutions to solve big data challenges.
Before joining Vision-e, Sherman held senior positions at The Connors Group and Comodo, where he drove innovation in cloud-based solutions for the financial and internet security industries, respectively.
About Vision-e:
Vision-e is a Salesforce ISV partner and provider of sales solutions that help businesses of all sizes and budgets streamline their organization to become more productive, efficient and profitable. Founded by sales professionals who believe customers come first, no matter what, Vision-e provides one-of-a-kind business productivity applications and customized, enterprise services from certified Administrators.
For more information on Vision-e, go to http://www.Visione.com or call 1-888-611-2679. Vision-e is headquartered in Fairfield, NJ.
